text: Vedanāsu vedanāññatarāhaṃ bhikkhave evaṃ vadāmi yadidaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ sādhukaṃ manasikāraṃ
edit: Vedanāsu vedanāññatarāhaṃ bhikkhave evaṃ vadāmi yadidaṃ – assāsapassāsānaṃ sādhukaṃ manasikāraṃ

translations.transtext: Monks, I call, namely, the careful consideration of breathing in and breathing out, thus a certain feeling in feelings.
